message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget constraints. While $9,800 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This would still give us both a fair deal. Let me know if you're interested.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10,250. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
